QuestData.Title: Villains of Darrowshire
QuestData.Description: The Annals of Darrowshire tells of the villains of that battle. It tells how the ghoul lord Horgus the Ravager was destroyed by Alliance forces during the battle. He was slain among the foothills north of here, and his skull remains there.$B$BMarduk the Black was never defeated, but his fabled sword now rusts, ownerless. It can be found near the road to our southeast.$B$BRetrieve these items, $n. I know not why, but I am certain their fate lies with you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Skull of Horgus and the Shattered Sword of Marduk to Chromie at Crown Guard Tower in Eastern Plaguelands.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find the skull and the sword, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: You found them! Well done, $n! These relics hold within them the memories of the Scourge forces at Darrowshire. We will need these if we are to save your Joseph Redpath.
